description:
On New Year’s Day, Izuru hosts a kite-flying contest in the hopes of everyone having a good time. Meanwhile, Rukia is practicing a dance she will perform for the New Year’s Celebration Ceremony but cannot seem to get the steps right.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Les Shinigami entrent dans la bataille. Le Seireitei a aussi un Nouvel An spécial
Shinigami Sansen! Seireitei mo Oshougatsu SP!
The Shinigami Enter Battle! Seireitei Also Has a New Year Special!
死神参戦! 瀞霊廷もお正月SP!
